scene.text: You hear a deep whisper coming from behind you.

scene.name: Male voice
scene.text: Are you even awake?
… As I was saying. This way you can watch your shows without anyone bothering you. Isn’t that delightful?

scene.name: Girl's voice (Behind you)
scene.text: See? Didn’t I tell you? He isn’t going to listen.

scene.name: Male voice
scene.text: Oh come now… You do want to behave, don’t you?

scene.name: Male voice
scene.text: … huh? You’re behaving?
Maybe we didn’t have to send you here after all…
Wouldn’t it be nice if we could just take you back home right now?
Heh
Heheheheheheheheheheheh.
We can't though
Heh

scene.name: Girl's voice
scene.text: HEY ENOUGH! I-
Anyway… I heard there was an entire TV Box in your room, gramps.

scene.name: Girl's voice
scene.text: It’s going to rain soon… You need to get inside sooner or later. You don’t want to get sick, do you?

scene.name: Male voice
scene.text: Go on, it’ll be good for you. No-one here will bother you anymore… Well unless-
did you get all that?

scene.name: You
scene.text: [Begin to cry]

scene.name: Male voice
scene.text: What the-
I don’t have a tissue. Nurse! Nurse! Get me a tissue.
Here you go, some napkins. Can you apply it yourself?
TAKE IT… IT'S NAPKINS... CLEAN YOURSELF, DAMN.
Heh. That's better.
